snippet: TAFFAE--Robert C. Uncle Bob, Our drives in your T-Bird to the beach, following the adventures of your imaginary friend "Bobby" and your genuine caring made us feel so loved. You are and always will be our very special uncle--our friend. Uncle Bob,...
lead_paragraph: TAFFAE--Robert C. Uncle Bob, Our drives in your T-Bird to the beach, following the adventures of your imaginary friend "Bobby" and your genuine caring made us feel so loved. You are and always will be our very special uncle--our friend. Uncle Bob, we hope you knew how important you were to us. We will always love you and keep our special memories of you in our hearts. Your nieces, Susan and Nancy 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TAFFAE, ROBERT C
